title: Continuous Hochschild Cohomology and Formality
summary: We define the appropriate homological setting to study deformation theory of complete locally convex (curved) dg-algebras based on Positselski's contraderived categories. We define the corresponding Hochschild complex controlling deformations and prove formality theorems for the Fréchet algebras of smooth functions on a manifold, the de Rham algebra and for the Dolbeault algebra of a complex manifold. In the latter case, the Hochschild cohomology is equivalent to Kontsevich's extended deformation complex, the Hochschild cohomology of the derived category in case $X$ is a smooth projective variety and to Gualtieri's deformation complex of $X$ viewed as generalized complex manifold. We also compute the continuous Hochschild cohomology for various categories of matrix factorisations.

AI.tldr: 该论文为完备局部凸(弯曲)dg-代数的形变理论建立了同调框架，基于Positselski的反导出范畴，定义了控制形变的Hochschild复形，并对流形上的光滑函数Fréchet代数、de Rham代数和复流形的Dolbeault代数证明了形式性定理。
AI.motivation: 研究完备局部凸(弯曲)dg-代数的形变理论，为分析几何对象（如流形上的函数代数、微分形式代数）的形变提供同调框架，并将这些形变理论与Kontsevich、Gualtieri等人的形变复形联系起来。
AI.method: 基于Positselski的反导出范畴理论，为完备局部凸(弯曲)dg-代数定义适当的同调设置，构造控制形变的Hochschild复形，并证明多个重要代数的形式性定理。
AI.result: 证明了Fréchet代数、de Rham代数和Dolbeault代数的形式性定理；建立了Dolbeault代数的Hochschild上同调与Kontsevich扩展形变复形、导出范畴的Hochschild上同调（光滑射影簇情形）以及Gualtieri广义复流形形变复形的等价性；计算了多种矩阵分解范畴的连续Hochschild上同调。
AI.conclusion: 成功为完备局部凸(弯曲)dg-代数建立了形变理论的同调框架，将多种几何代数的形变问题统一处理，并建立了与现有重要形变理论的联系，为相关领域的研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Quiver Hecke algebras for Borcherds-Cartan datum III: Categorification of quantum Borcherds superalgebras
summary: We introduce a family of the quiver Hecke superalgebras which give a categorification of quantum Borcherds superalgebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入了箭图Hecke超代数族，为量子Borcherds超代数提供了范畴化
AI.motivation: 为量子Borcherds超代数建立范畴化理论，扩展量子群范畴化的研究框架
AI.method: 引入箭图Hecke超代数族作为范畴化工具，构造与量子Borcherds超代数对应的代数结构
AI.result: 成功建立了量子Borcherds超代数的范畴化，将代数结构转化为范畴理论
AI.conclusion: 箭图Hecke超代数族为量子Borcherds超代数提供了有效的范畴化框架，扩展了量子群表示理论的研究工具

title: Canonical differential calculi via functorial geometrization
summary: Given a category $\mathcal{E}$, we establish sufficient conditions on a faithful isofibration $\mathcal{E}\rightarrow\operatorname{Mon}(\mathcal{V})$ valued in the category of monoids internal to a monoidal additive category $\mathcal{V}$ such that $\mathcal{E}$ admits a canonical functor to the category of first order differential calculi in $\mathcal{V}$. Generalizing the procedure of extending a first order differential calculus to its maximal prolongation to this setting, we obtain a canonical functor from $\mathcal{E}$ to the category of differential calculi in $\mathcal{V}$. This yields a simultaneous generalization of the de Rham complex on $C^{\infty}$-rings, the Kähler differentials on commutative algebras, and the universal differential calculus on associative algebras. As a consequence, such categories $\mathcal{E}$ admit natural analogues of the notions of smooth map and diffeomorphism, as well as a functorial de Rham theory. Moreover, whenever two such faithful isofibrations to $\operatorname{Mon}(\mathcal{V})$ factor suitably, their corresponding de Rham functors are related via a comparison map. Developing this theory requires first extending the noncommutative geometry formalism of differential calculi from associative algebras to the setting of monoids internal to monoidal additive categories.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了一个框架，将一阶微分计算从代数推广到任意幺半加性范畴中的幺半群，并构造了从忠实同构纤维化到微分计算范畴的典范函子。
AI.motivation: 动机在于统一不同数学背景下的微分计算理论，包括光滑环上的de Rham复形、交换代数上的Kähler微分、以及结合代数上的通用微分计算，为这些看似不同的结构提供一个共同的理论框架。
AI.method: 方法是通过建立忠实同构纤维化到幺半加性范畴中幺半群范畴的条件，构造从范畴ℰ到一阶微分计算范畴的典范函子，并推广一阶微分计算到其最大延拓的过程，从而得到从ℰ到微分计算范畴的函子。
AI.result: 结果为这样的范畴ℰ自然地获得了光滑映射和微分同胚的类似概念，以及函子化的de Rham理论。当两个忠实同构纤维化适当地分解时，它们对应的de Rham函子通过比较映射相关联。
AI.conclusion: 结论是该理论将非交换几何中的微分计算形式主义从结合代数推广到幺半加性范畴中的幺半群，为不同数学领域的微分计算提供了统一的框架和自然推广。

title: Freidel-Maillet type equations on fused K-matrices over the positive part of $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$
summary: The positive part $U_q^+$ of the quantized enveloping algebra $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$ has a reflection equation presentation of Freidel-Maillet type, due to Baseilhac 2021. This presentation involves a K-matrix of dimension $2 \times 2$. Under an embedding of $U_q^+$ into a $q$-shuffle algebra due to Rosso 1995, this K-matrix can be written in closed form using a PBW basis for $U_q^+$ due to Terwilliger 2019. This PBW basis, together with two PBW bases due to Damiani 1993 and Beck 1994, can be obtain from a uniform approach by Ruan 2025. Following a natural fusion technique, we will construct fused K-matrices of arbitary meaningful dimension in closed form using the uniform approach. We will also show that any pair of these fused K-matrices satisfy Freidel-Maillet type equations.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了量子包络代数Uq(𝔰𝔩̂₂)的正部分Uq⁺的反射方程表示，通过融合技术构造任意维度的融合K-矩阵，并证明它们满足Freidel-Maillet型方程。
AI.motivation: 研究量子代数Uq⁺的反射方程表示，特别是K-矩阵的构造和性质，为理解量子代数结构和相关物理模型提供理论基础。
AI.method: 采用Freidel-Maillet型反射方程表示，利用Rosso的q-洗牌代数嵌入，结合Terwilliger的PBW基，通过Ruan的统一方法获得PBW基，最后应用自然融合技术构造任意维度的融合K-矩阵。
AI.result: 成功构造了任意有意义的维度的融合K-矩阵的闭形式表达式，并证明了任意一对这样的融合K-矩阵都满足Freidel-Maillet型方程。
AI.conclusion: 通过统一方法获得了Uq⁺的PBW基，并利用融合技术系统地构造了满足反射方程的K-矩阵，为量子代数的表示理论和相关物理应用提供了新的工具。

title: Shifted twisted Yangians and affine Grassmannian islices
comment: v2, 63 pages, this is Part 2 of the longer v1, with Part 1 now a separate article in arXiv:2512.19998
summary: In a prequel we introduced the shifted iYangians ${}^\imath Y_μ$ associated to quasi-split Satake diagrams of type ADE and even spherical coweights $μ$, and constructed the iGKLO representations of ${}^\imath Y_μ$, which factor through truncated shifted iYangians ${}^\imath Y_μ^λ$. In this paper, we show that ${}^\imath Y_μ$ quantizes the involutive fixed point locus ${}^\imath W_μ$ arising from affine Grassmannians of type ADE, and supply strong evidence toward the expectation that ${}^\imath Y_μ^λ$ quantizes a top-dimensional component of the affine Grassmannian islice ${}^\imath\overline{W}_μ^λ$. We identify the islices ${}^\imath\overline{W}_μ^λ$ in type AI with suitable nilpotent Slodowy slices of type BCD, building on the work of Lusztig and Mirković-Vybornov in type A. We propose a framework for producing ortho-symplectic (and hybrid) Coulomb branches from split (and nonsplit) Satake framed double quivers, which are conjectured to relate closely to the islices ${}^\imath\overline{W}_μ^λ$ and the algebras ${}^\imath Y_μ^λ$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了与ADE型拟分裂Satake图相关的移位iYangians代数，证明其量化了来自ADE型仿射Grassmannian的固定点轨迹，并提出了从分裂和非分裂Satake框架双箭图产生正交辛（及混合）Coulomb分支的框架。
AI.motivation: 研究iYangians代数与仿射Grassmannian几何结构之间的量化关系，特别是探索移位iYangians如何量化仿射Grassmannian的固定点轨迹，并建立代数结构与几何切片之间的对应关系。
AI.method:
1. 证明移位iYangians ${}^\imath Y_μ$ 量化了来自ADE型仿射Grassmannian的固定点轨迹 ${}^\imath W_μ$
2. 在AI型中识别切片 ${}^\imath\overline{W}_μ^λ$ 与BCD型的适当幂零Slodowy切片
3. 提出从分裂和非分裂Satake框架双箭图产生正交辛（及混合）Coulomb分支的框架
AI.result:
1. 提供了强有力证据表明截断移位iYangians ${}^\imath Y_μ^λ$ 量化了仿射Grassmannian切片 ${}^\imath\overline{W}_μ^λ$ 的顶层分量
2. 建立了AI型切片与BCD型幂零Slodowy切片之间的对应关系
3. 提出了连接代数 ${}^\imath Y_μ^λ$ 与几何切片 ${}^\imath\overline{W}_μ^λ$ 的理论框架
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了移位iYangians代数与仿射Grassmannian几何结构之间的深刻联系，为理解量子代数与几何表示论之间的关系提供了新视角，并提出了连接分裂/非分裂Satake框架双箭图与Coulomb分支的统一框架。
